default.title: Clock Cycle Accelerator
default.description: +1 tick/sec per level.

default.title: Overpressure Fission
default.description: Cells gain more power at high heat: +1% at 1k heat, +2% at 2m, etc.

default.title: Heat Control Operator
default.description: Auto-cooling stops below max heat.

default.title: Smart Coolant Regulator
default.description: Outlets limit output to connected vents' capacity.

default.title: Coolant Flow Calibration
default.description: Manual venting is 10x more effective per level.

default.title: Containment Metallurgy
default.description: Plating heat capacity +100% per level.

default.title: Grid Transformer Tuning
default.description: Auto-sells 1% of power each tick per level.

default.title: Electrode Material Refinement
default.description: Capacitor power and heat capacity +100% per level.

default.title: Perpetual Capacitors
default.description: Capacitors auto-replace on cool tiles at 10x cost. Contained heat vents to the reactor.

default.title: Coolant Formulation Enrichment
default.description: Coolant Cell heat capacity +100% per level.

default.title: Reflector Density Compaction
default.description: Reflector duration +100% per level.

default.title: Neutron Mirror Polishing
default.description: Reflectors: +1% power per level.

default.title: Perpetual Reflectors
default.description: Reflectors auto-replace on cool tiles at 1.5x cost.

default.title: Enhanced Thermal Conductivity
default.description: Exchangers, Inlets, Outlets: +100% capacity and exchange per level

default.title: Reinforced Heat Exchangers
default.description: Exchanger transfer +1% per Plating level per upgrade level.

default.title: Active Exchangers
default.description: Exchanger transfer +1% per Capacitor level per upgrade level.

default.title: Thermal Emission Coating
default.description: Vents: +100% vent rate and capacity per level.

default.title: Structural Heatsink Integration
default.description: Vent rate +1% per Plating level per upgrade level.

default.title: Active Venting
default.description: Vent effectiveness +1% per Capacitor level per upgrade level.

default.title: Expand Reactor Rows
default.description: Adds 1 row per level.

default.title: Expand Reactor Cols
default.description: Adds 1 column per level.

default.title: Laboratory
default.description: Unlocks experimental upgrades.

default.title: Infused Cells
default.description: Cells: +100% power per level.

default.title: Unleashed Cells
default.description: Cells: +100% power and heat per level.

default.title: Protium Cells
default.description: Unlocks Protium Cells.

default.title: Quantum Buffering
default.description: Capacitors/Platings: reactor power and heat capacity x2 per level. Capacitors: heat capacity x2 per level.

default.title: Full Spectrum Reflectors
default.description: Reflectors: +100% of base reflection per level.

default.title: Fluid Hyperdynamics
default.description: Vents/Exchangers/Inlets/Outlets: x2 effectiveness per level.

default.title: Fractal Piping
default.description: Vents/Exchangers: x2 base heat capacity per level.

default.title: Ultracryonics
default.description: Coolant Cells: x2 base heat capacity per level.

default.title: Zero-Point Core
default.description: Reactor base heat and power capacity x4 per level.

default.title: Unstable Protium
default.description: Protium Cells: duration 0.5x; power/heat x2 per level.

default.title: Heat Reflection
default.description: Unlocks Thermal Neutron Reflectors. Increases EP cost of other experimental part upgrades.

default.title: Experimental Capacitance
default.description: Unlocks Extreme Capacitors. Increases EP cost of other experimental part upgrades.

default.title: Vortex Cooling
default.description: Unlocks Extreme Vents. Increases EP cost of other experimental part upgrades.

default.title: Subterranean Heat Sink

default.title: Vortex Extraction
default.description: Unlocks Extreme Heat Inlets. Increases EP cost of other experimental part upgrades.

default.title: Explosive Ejection
default.description: Unlocks Extreme Heat Outlets. Increases EP cost of other experimental part upgrades.

default.title: Thermionic Conversion

default.title: Micro Capacitance
